articles.author: RobertJones
articles.title: Frustration boils over for Scott Redding in Aragon; 'hard to accept' - Crash
articles.description: In what was by far his worst weekend as a WorldSBK rider, Scott Redding showed immense frustration with his M 1000 RR after running as low down as last in race two.
articles.content: The 2020 WorldSBK runner-up struggled all weekend, not just compared to the likes of Alvaro Bautista, Jonathan Rea and Toprak Razgatlioglu, but relative to all three other BWM riders, including stand… [+4009 chars]
